title: READY FOR MOVE IN? CALL TODAY!!! (10730)
posting_body: * Pictures above are of a representative unit*

Find yourself living in your spacious 1-Bedroom, nestled in the heart of Sun-Valley, where your close to lots of amenities, all the attractions that North Hollywood or Burbank has to offer, Bob Hope Burbank Airport, the i5 and 170 freeways, within minutes you can drive and enjoy Six Flags Magic Mountain or Universal Studios – Hollywood, or hang around and enjoy Sun-Valley Recreational Park, Businesses, delicious restaurants and surrounding shopping centers for your enjoyment.
We love to have you as our Resident!
For More Information Please Call, Text, or Email
